getVIF Converts the R-square to the variance inflation factor

#### Description

calculates vif = 1/(1-R-square)

#### Usage

getVIF(rsq)


#### Arguments
rsq a vector of real values, presumably fitted R-squares

#### Value
a vector of vif estimates

#### Author(s)
Paul E. Johnson <pauljohn@ku.edu>
